adrFormatAddress: 605 W 48th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: Me and Girlys had such an amazing time at Big Apple Brunch . It was definitely an experience that I wont forget. Our Server was so kind and helpful. Loved the workers and also loved the owner super sweet . Big apple brunch definitely made my dream become reality. Definitely worth the money for sure. Thank you for such a wonderful experience.

text.text: Me and Girlys had such an amazing time at Big Apple Brunch . It was definitely an experience that I wont forget. Our Server was so kind and helpful. Loved the workers and also loved the owner super sweet . Big apple brunch definitely made my dream become reality. Definitely worth the money for sure. Thank you for such a wonderful experience.

originalText.text: Excellent place for a brunch celebration! They have everything you’d need to have a good time. The perfect Dj with a festive playlist. He’s very hype and involved in making sure we’re having a good time. Playing a good mix of the old school classics and new music. We all had a great time! I think we were there 2:15-5:30, much longer than anticipated. It was empty at first and it continued to be empty for a while but eventually the tables filled-up. Perfect for large groups and the hookah is good and at a very reasonable price. The mimosas and Bellinis were not the strongest but that’s a good thing when you’re there for so long. Overall, highly recommended. I personally didn’t like the brunch menu so I ate before and just ordered a salad. Service is great, they keep the pitchers coming. I ordered some cocktails at the bar which were good the staff was nice (just beware of the automatic gratuity at the bar even if just ordering one drink).

I ordered some cocktails at the bar which were good the staff was nice (just beware of the automatic gratuity at the bar even if just ordering one drink).

originalText.text: I did not have the experience others had because I went at 2pm on a Sunday it was very empty but I had a party of 10 and we made the best of our time. They did take the card and I’d for some odd reason before taking the food orders. The food was not hot when it came out but again we made the best of it. We were told we only had the table for 90 mins and even when we were ready to leave which it was still early the place was still pretty empty. The DJ made up for everything he played like the room was full and they did come around with free shots. Overall I will give it 4 stars.

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of experiencing brunch at big apple brunch, and it was nothing short of delightful. From the moment I stepped in, the inviting ambiance set the perfect tone for a leisurely mid-morning meal.

The menu boasts a diverse array of options, catering to various tastes and dietary preferences. Each dish demonstrated a thoughtful fusion of flavors and fresh, high-quality ingredients. Whether you're a fan of classic breakfast staples or adventurous brunch creations, big apple brunch has something to satisfy every palate.

The service was impeccable, with attentive staff members who contributed to the overall positive dining experience. They were knowledgeable about the menu and offered helpful recommendations, enhancing the sense of hospitality.

What truly stood out was the attention to detail in presentation. Each plate was a work of art, combining aesthetic appeal with a burst of flavors that left my taste buds craving more. The chefs at [clearly take pride in their craft, elevating the brunch experience to a memorable culinary journey.

The cozy atmosphere, coupled with a well-curated beverage selection, made for a leisurely and enjoyable brunch outing. Whether you're catching up with friends, celebrating a special occasion, or simply indulging in a weekend treat, l big apple brunch is a brunch destination that warrants high praise.

In conclusion, my brunch experience at big apple brunch was a symphony of taste, service, and ambiance. It's a gem for brunch enthusiasts seeking a place where quality meets creativity. I wholeheartedly recommend big apple brunch for an exceptional brunch adventure that transcends the ordinary.
Shout out to Steve he made our experience so easy and great.

originalText.text: I came here with on a Sunday. Steven made cure I was well acomdated. I don’t usually get that treatment other places. Therefore, I will be back. Food was amazing. Vibe was super fun. Music was a mix of modern and 90s vibes. Loved it!
